_sText:
No Pictures but have the latest video out on YouTube:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GHY7LfY3dIM

INSTALL:

Put in .bsp file into the following folder:

***\steamapps\common\Counter-Strike Source\cstrike\maps

NOTE: YOU WILL NEED TO DOWNLOAD 'DOCTOR WHO MODEL PACK 4' MATERIALS AND MODELS (LINK BELOW) AND PLACE IN:

\steamapps\common\Counter-Strike Source\cstrike\materials

&

\steamapps\common\Counter-Strike Source\cstrike\models





This map IS NOT finished. For the mean time, the Library has not got any props inside. still, a fun area to mess about in. I am willing to make adjustments to this map, but like i state below, I am NOT a mapper and this is my first map ever.

I apologize with the delay in the update. I had tried to compile a version for you guys to download a lot sooner but had errors in hammer which i had to sort out first.

None-the-less, enjoy! :)




This map features an outside area which can be used for both, Assault and Sniping (Gmod or CSS). 
Walking into the TARDIS front viewpoint will teleport you to the interior.

Inside the TARDIS, you will find:
Console Room
Swimming Pool
Anti-Gravity Chamber
Cinema
Library
Universal Prision


Credits to:

Tyson Dostal for allowing me the use of the 'Library' and 'Cinema' from HIS TARDIS Interior Map:
http://gmod.gamebanana.com/maps/163965

TheSniper9 for allowing me to use his Doctor Who and TARDIS interior models:
http://www.garrysmod.org/downloads/?a...

I do not class myself a mapper of any sort so please no requests, however, I am willing to listen and 
modify THIS map from any Ideas/Crits you guys may have.
(Just..please don't ask me to redo the tunnels.. they are badly carved and was a pain in the arse for 
someone with no experience in mapping) 

This is the Matt Smith Interior for the TARDIS. I based the layout to the PSHome Network BBC Official 
TARDIS (downloadable as a home). I consider this the most, if not the only, legit version of the TARDIS 
as it is made by the BBC... Doctor Who shown by the BBC.

This is my first ever map, please be Gentle :)
